ygData.subject: Re: RDragon splitting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I guess there s two things that influence this for me:  1) if I m with my guild, 2) if it s a no-drop item.  If I m in a mixed group, though, and a
ygData.messageBody:
Dark wrote:

> From: "Dark" <jackal@...>
>
> As you said it all depends on what your camping. ... If it's rare or a pain in the ass
> to get to then it should go to who can use it. If it's common then it should
> go to who ever wins the lotto. That's my opinion anyway.
>
> Naeeldar
>

Well, I guess there's two things that influence this for me: 1) if I'm with my guild, 2) if it's a
no-drop item. If I'm in a mixed group, though, and a spawn has a common drop worth, say, 100pp or the
equivalent that I can use, and a rare drop worth 1000pp that I cannot use, I still say I should be in the
lotto for the rare drop. I may not be able to use THAT item, but I can certainly use the 1000pp or the
trade equivalent. Since I often have to stand in line for hours just to get into one group, I have to
live by their rules, though, which is one of the reasons I'm so stinking poor.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 36 songs, Innoruuk
